title: .NET MAUI In Action - Book Launch Party
abstract:
✅ LIMITED SPOTS ➡️RSVP

About the event:

We are excited to invite you to the exclusive book launch party for ".NET MAUI in Action" authored by SSW Solution Architect, Matt Goldman.

Join us for a fun and informative evening to celebrate the release of his exciting new book.

N﻿ote - Dress Code: Smart Casual

--

Agenda (AEST)

The evening will feature:

1. Author Presentation: Matt Goldman will provide insights into the development of ".NET MAUI in Action" and share his expertise on the topic.

2. Networking: Connect with fellow tech enthusiasts, developers, and professionals in a relaxed atmosphere.

3. Q&A Session: Have your questions about .NET MAUI, the latest mobile and desktop development solution by Microsoft, answered by the author himself.

4. Book Signing: Get your copy of ".NET MAUI in Action" signed by Matt Goldman.

5. Refreshments: Enjoy delicious food and drinks throughout the evening.

--

About the Author:

Matt is a Solution Architect, Scrum Master, public speaker, author and trainer.

Since joining SSW, Matt has worked on a number of projects for a range of clients, including government agencies and multinational organisations. Matt loves making things, and at SSW uses that passion to fuel his work with .NET, EF / EF Core, Xamarin and .NET MAUI, Azure and Blazor. Matt also works with security and authentication/authorisation.

Matt (author of .NET MAUI in Action) regularly presents at the .NET User Group in 3 states, has hosted SSW's Xamarin Hack Day, has presented at the .NET Superpowers Tour, and regularly co-hosts SSW's Clean Architecture Superpowers and Clean Architecture Workshop. Matt has also presented at NDC Sydney.

Drawing on a combination of hands-on experience and enterprise governance practices, Matt is able to make connections between business and technology to deliver user and business-focused outcomes.

Matt has worked in IT for 15 years, and in addition to his development work has a background in infrastructure and management, and has delivered security policies, IT strategies and disaster recovery plans to a number of high-profile national and multi-national clients.
